newsitem.title: USA: PRESS DIGEST - Daily Variety - October 24.
newsitem.headline: PRESS DIGEST - Daily Variety - October 24.

text.p: The following stories appeared in Thursday's edition of Daily Variety:

HOLLYWOOD - WABC New York president and general manager Walter Liss was named chairman of Buena Vista Television on Wednesday, replacing Randy Reiss, executive vice president of the Walt Disney Co Studios, who has resigned.

HOLLYWOOD - PolyGram NV issued a profits warning and announced a $90 million one-time restructuring charge for its music operations. It said its 1996 operating result will be flat or slightly below last year's figure, even before the $90 million hit.
